channel.title: Fixed
channel.description:
I need to change the title box, I just need a picture of one, I've looked everywhere on my computer, I can't find one. I looked on google a bit, all that came up was some pretty nasty pictures of people having sex.
So I'm here, can somebody help me by maybe uploading a picture of [i]their[/i] title box? Thank you :)
Edit: After a few hours of work, I finished, it is a lot better. :D
Closed.

item.title: Fixed
